newsitem.title: USA: BankBoston sheds consumer finance unit for stock.
newsitem.headline: BankBoston sheds consumer finance unit for stock.

text.p: BankBoston said Friday that it agreed to exchange its consumer finance subsidiary, Fidelity Acceptance Corp, for a 16 percent interest in Mercury Finance Co
Under the terms of the agreement BankBoston will receive 32.7 million shares of Mercury's common stock. Mercury closed at $14 a share on Friday.

The transaction, subject to regulatory approval, is expected to close during the first quarter of 1997, BankBoston said in a statement. BankBoston said it will also get two seats on Mercury's board of directors.
